snippet: The news comes on top of Visa Inc. announcing in September that it was “considering its options” regarding the stake.
abstract: DealBook Online; British mobile payment developer Monitise says Visa Europe plans to sell down its 5.3 percent stake in company.
lead_paragraph: The news comes on top of Visa Inc. announcing in September that it was “considering its options” regarding the stake.

headline.main: Visa Europe to Reduce Its Stake in Mobile Payment Company Monitise
